Execution Guidelines
- Track checklist progress in this file and the shared todo list.
- Keep explanations concise; if a step is skipped, state why.
- Use the current directory as project root; avoid creating extra folders.
- Only install extensions specified by get_project_setup_info.
- Use placeholders only when necessary and label them.
- Task is complete when the project builds cleanly, README is current, and launch instructions are provided.
